app.name: Flappy Bird GX2
app.short_description: A Flappy Bird clone for Wii U
app.long_description:
A Flappy Bird clone for WiiU using GX2 graphics Don't hit pipes! And don't fall down too!
Press A to start and jump
Credits: dimok - WiiU librabries, dynamic_libs, examples, Homebrew Launcher Maschell - GX2_Example and coding help vgmoose - Coding help pwsincd - Icon QuarkTheAwesome, dylon99 - Various help and testing
